page.title: 10Community Life
page.content: Much of the community life in the area is centred around two{village {halls,}one in Sparrowpit and one in Peak Forest, around the{churches}in both villages and around the{primary {school. Both village halls have{committees who arrange dances, jumble sales, whist drives, functions for the elderly etc. and both are meeting places for other social groups. The churches arrange functions primarily to raise money for their upkeep and there is an annual church {bazaar}in Peak Forest and similar events in Sparrowpit. The Primary School has an active {Parent Teacher's Association}which organises events of a social and fund raising nature. The local Playgroup also holds similar events.
